io.doov.core.dsl.meta

Interface Metadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Readable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PredicateMetadata
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMetadata, BinaryMetadata, BinaryPredicateMetadata, BooleanFunctionMetadata, ConditionalMappingMetadata, ConverterMetadata, EmptyMetadata, IterableFunctionMetadata, LeafMetadata, LeafPredicateMetadata, MapFunctionMetadata, MappingInputMetadata, MappingMetadata, MappingRegistryMetadata, MappingRuleMetadata, NaryMetadata, NaryPredicateMetadata, NumericFunctionMetadata, RuleMetadata, StringFunctionMetadata, TemporalAdjusterMetadata, TemporalFunctionMetadata, UnaryMetadata, UnaryPredicateMetadata, WhenMetadata

    public interface Metadata
extends Readable
    Interface for the description of a node in the syntax tree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.stream.Stream<Metadata> children()
      Returns the direct children of this node in a flat list.
      default java.util.List<Element> flatten()
      Returns the tree of elements under this node in a flat list.

      Returns the direct left children of this node in a flat list.
      default java.lang.String markdown()

      Returns the human readable version of this object.

      Returns the human readable version of this object.

      Returns the reduce metadata tree from the given context.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<Metadata> right()
      Returns the direct right children of this node in a flat list.
      MetadataType type()
      Returns the metadata type.

      • reduce

        default Metadata reduce(Context context,
                        ReduceType type)
        Returns the reduce metadata tree from the given context. The metadata tree is returned in its shortest form by pruning branches in the evaluated syntax tree.
        Parameters:
        context - the evaluated context
        type - the type of reduction
        Returns:
        the metadata
